original_title: Phantom of the Mall: Eric's Revenge
overview: A young man named Eric apparently dies in a suspicious house fire after saving his girlfriend, Melody. One year later, a new mall is constructed atop where Eric's house once stood, where a shadowy, uninvited guest is preying on the mall's crooked developers.
tagline: Prices Aren't The Only Thing Being Slashed!
title: Phantom of the Mall: Eric's Revenge
